About Me

I like back end web application and mobile application development. I have done many internships working as a software developer seeing as my university has a mandatory co op program for Computer Engineering.

I have worked at Research In Motion, SAP, Bank of Montreal and the City of Waterloo.

If you would like to discuss any of my past projects then you can contact me! If you are looking to hire a software developer and wish to set up an interview then please note that I will be graduating in the winter of 2014.
